sets.name: Balance of Terror OP Special Build Cards
sets.comment: These faux-cards cover the special rules for the Balance of Terror OP

ships.name: U.S.S. Defiant NCC-1764
ships.text: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

ships.name: Muratas
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shields to re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice or Roll Defence Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may switch and [evade], [scan], or [target-lock] Token that is beside your ship for a [battlestations] Token.

ships.name: Calindra
ships.text: When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may discard a blue [target-lock] Token from beside your ship to re-roll all of your defense dice.

ships.name: Sela's Warbird
ships.text: During the Activation Phase, if your ship is Cloaked and performs the [sensor-echo] Action, you may flip your [cloak] Token over to its red side and immediately perform an additional [sensor-echo] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: I.K.S. Toral
ships.text: When defending, during the Roll Defence Dice step, if your ship is not Cloaked, you may roll +2 defence dice. If you do so place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. Hegh'ta
ships.text: If your ship is within Range 1 of a friendly ship, each time it defends, it rolls +1 defense die. This ability may only be used for 1 friendly ship per round.

ships.name: Orassin
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may spend your [battlestations] Token to convert one of your [hit] results into a [crit] result.

ships.name: I.K.S. Bortas
ships.text: When Defending, During the Modify Defense dice step, you may re-roll one of your defense dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-B
ships.text: During the Combat Phase, you may replace 1 [battlestations], [scan] or blue [target-lock] Token that is beside your ship with an [evade] Token.

ships.name: Kohlars Battle Cruiser
ships.text: During the End Phase, if your [cloak] Token is on its red side, you may flip it back to its green side. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: I.R.W. Rateg
ships.text: When defending, if your ship is Cloaked, you may re-roll up to 2 of your defense dice.

ships.name: U.S.S. Venture
ships.text: If you attack a ship that is in the forward firing arc of another friendly ship, you gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Cairo
ships.text: When defending, if there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll +1 defense die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A
ships.text: When attacking during the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship gain +1 attack die +2 if the defending ship is Cloaked.

ships.name: H.M.S. Bounty
ships.text:
If there are only Federation cards assigned to this ship, add the [scan] and [battlestations] icons to the Action Bar. 

This ship cannot be in the same fleet as Kruge's Bird-of-Prey.

ships.name: Cube 384
ships.text: Your shields cannot be affected by Upgrades from an opponent's fleet.

ships.name: Sphere 936
ships.text: If this ship is a support ship, you may equip 1 Upgrade (of your choice) at -2 SP to this ship and you may use a 1 [straight], 2 [straight], or 3 [straight] Maneuver Template to place it in the play area when it becomes Active.

ships.name: Kruge's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text: ACTION: Once this round, if you inflict a critical damage on an enemy ship's Hull, you may search the Damaage Deck for a "Direct Hit" damage card and place it beside the enemy's Ship Card. Shuffle the Damaage Deck when you are done.

ships.name: I.R.W. Algeron
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if your ship is not Cloaked, during the Declare Target step, you may perform a 1 [straight] Maneuver before chosing an enemy ship to attack.

ships.name: U.S.S. Reliant
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable any number of your Active Shields to re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of Shields you disabled.

ships.name: I.K.S. Drovana
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard 1 of your non-disabled Upgrades to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result.

ships.name: U.S.S. Constellation
ships.text: If all of your Shields have been destroyed when attacking with your Primary Weapon, you may gain +2 attack dice. If you do, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot roll any defence dice during a round in which you use this ability.

ships.name: Xindus
ships.text: When firing a Photon Torpedo Upgrade, place 1 less Time Token on that Upgrade.

ships.name: I.R.W. Jazkal
ships.text: While there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, you cannot be targeted by any [talent] Upgrades and you roll +1 defense die against all attacks made with [weapon] Upgrades.

ships.name: I.K.S. Amar
ships.text: When attacking if you do not hit the defending ship, place an [evade] Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Montgolfier
ships.text: If your ship has an opposing ship target locked, during the Activation Phase, you may switch the target lock to a diffrent ship within Range 1-3 as a free Action

ships.name: Weapon Zero
ships.text: When defending, during the Roll Defence Dice step you may roll 1 defence die for each [hit] or [crit] result rolled by the attacking ship. If you do so, Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Scorpion 4
ships.text:
Attack Squadron Tokens: 5

If you attack during a round in which you performed a ([come-about]) Come About Maneuver, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

ships.name: ROMULAN ATTACK FIGHTERS
ships.text: Attack Squadron Tokens: 4

ships.name: I.R.W. T'MET
ships.text: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, when attacking with your Primary Weapon at Range 1 this round, gain +1 attack die and roll -1 defence die.

ships.name: Dreadnought
ships.text: You cannot assign a Captain or an Admiral to this ship. When defending during the Compare Results step you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades to cancel an equal number of attacking ships dice.

ships.name: Halik Raider
ships.text: When defending during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shilds to gain +2 defence dice for that attack.

ships.name: DENORIOUS
ships.text: When Defending during the Compare Results step, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to cancel 1 [hit] result.

ships.name: Robinson
ships.text: When defending if you are hit and you don't already have a 'Warp Core Breach' critical damage card assigned to your ship you may chose to ignore up to 3 damage being inflicted to your ship and suffer a 'Warp Core Breach' critical damage instead.

ships.name: U.S.S. Valiant
ships.text: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard the Photon Torpedoes Upgrade to gain 1 additional attack die.

ships.name: KUMARI
ships.text: You may perform an [evade] Action while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Hathaway
ships.text: During the Actavation Phase, you may perform a second Action from your Action Bar as a free Action. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: R.I.S. Pi
ships.text: During the Activation Phase you may perform a [scan] Action as a free Action. If you do so place an Auxiliry Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your primary weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 3 attack dice.

ships.name: Federation Starship
I.R.W. Khazara
ships.text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, add +1 attack die.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
I.K.S. Maht-H'A
ships.text: Any ship attacking you at Range 1 rolls 1 less attack die.

ships.name: Klingon Starship
U.S.S. Reliant
ships.text: You gain +1 attack die when firing at Range 1.

ships.name: Federation Starship
U.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: The U.S.S. Enterprise can perform an Action listed on its Action Bar while it has an Auxiliary Power Token.

ships.name: Federation Starship
I.R.W. Valdore
ships.text: If you perform a Green Maneuver, add +1 attack die for the remainder of this round.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
R.I.S. Apnex
ships.text: ACTION (once/game): Every ship at Range 1 sustains 1 damage (including this ship). During the Planning Phase, this ship must choose a '1' Maneuver (forward, bank or turn) for the rest of the game.

ships.name: Romulan Science Vessel
I.K.S. Gr'oth
ships.text: Each time you defend against a ship at Range 1, roll 1 extra defense die.

ships.name: Klingon Battlecruiser
I.K.S. Negh'var
ships.text: ACTION: Target a ship within your firing arc at Range 1-2 and roll 3 attack dice. For each [hit] result disable 1 of that ship's Shields. If possible, you may play Klingon Boarding Party as a free action this turn.

ships.name: Klingon Starship
Kraxon
ships.text: Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage you may transfer any amount of that damage to your own Shields, if possible.

ships.name: Dominion Starship
Gor Portas
ships.text: Although you must be Target Locked on a ship to fire a Torpedo at it, you do not need to discard your Target Lock when doing so.

ships.name: Dominion Starship
Krayton
ships.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die this round. You may re-roll all of your blank results once.

ships.name: Deep Space 9
ships.text: When firing any torpedoes, do not disable the torpedoes.

ships.name: Abandoned Space Station
I.K.S. Ch'tang
ships.text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

ships.name: Klingon Starship
P.W.B. Aj'Rmr
ships.text: Each time you attack, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice for every damage card assigned to your ship.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
U.S.S. Defiant
ships.text: When defending, convert all of your opponent's [crit] results into [hit] results.

ships.name: I.K.S. Kronos One
ships.text: Any ship attacking you at Range 3 rolls 1 less attack die.

ships.name: I.R.W. Praetus
ships.text: You may use the [cloak] Action even if you have no Active Shields. Whenever you choose the [cloak] Action, roll 1 attack die. On a [battlestations] result, your Hull sustains 1 Damage.

ships.name: 5th Wing Patrol Ship
ships.text: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. When defending this round, roll one less defense die.

ships.name: I.K.S. Koraga
ships.text: Each time you defend while Cloaked, roll +1 defense die

ships.name: Koranak
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack, you may spend a [scan] Token to attack 2 different ships with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice each.

ships.name: U.S.S. Excelsior
ships.text: After you move, if no enemy ships are within Range 1 of your ship, you may perform a [scan] action as a free action.

ships.name: R.I.S. Vo
ships.text: After you move, you may perform an [evade] Action as a free Action. If you do so, you cannot attack during this round.

ships.name: U.S.S. Sutherland
ships.text: When you initiate an attack at range 3, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

ships.name: Rav Laerst
ships.text: ACTION: Perform a [sensor-echo] Action even if this ship is not Cloaked. You may only use the 1 [forward] Maneuver Template for this Action.

ships.name: U.S.S. Equinox
ships.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields. During the End Phase this round, repair all of your damaged Shields.

ships.name: I.K.S. Somraw
ships.text: Each time you defend, you may convert up to 2 of your [battlestations] results into [evade] results.

ships.name: I.R.W. Gal Gath'thong
ships.text: When initiating an attack while Cloaked, you may fire Plasma Torpedoes without needing a Target Lock.

ships.name: 4th Division Battleship
ships.text: Each round, one other friendly Jem'Hadar ship within Range 1-2 of your ship may perform an Action on their Action Bar as a free Action.

ships.name: Akorem
ships.text: Each time you defend, if there is an [evade] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll all of your defense dice once. You must keep the outcome of the 2nd roll.

ships.name: Federation Attack Fighter
ships.text: If you initiate an attack at Range 1, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice. [Initial Captain skill 6]

ships.name: Hideki Class Attack Fighter
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack, you may make an attack with 2 dice from your rear firing arc. [Initial Captain skill 6]

ships.name: Borg Sphere 4270
ships.text: Each time you attack with your Primary Weapon, you may divide your attack between 2 different ships; you may divide your attack dice however you like, but you must roll at least 1 die against each ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Voyager
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 4 attack dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Nistrim Raider
ships.text: When attacking a ship with a Scan token beside it with your Primary Weapon, roll an additional +2 attack dice.

ships.name: Bioship Alpha
ships.text: When you attack with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 3 damage, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship.

ships.name: Tholia One
ships.text: You may perform the Action listed on the "Energy Web" Upgrade card as a free Action.

ships.name: D'Kyr
ships.text: Whenever you initiate an attack against an enemy ship at Range 3, gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: Interceptor 5
ships.text: You do not lose your "Perform Actions" step or take damage when you overlap a planet, obstacle or ship base. You may roll defense dice against any minefield.

ships.name: Tactical Cube 138
ships.text: The Borg Ablative Hull Armor [borg] Upgrade costs -3 SP to equip to this ship.

ships.name: S'Gorn
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 1 Critical Damage to the enemy ship's hull, that ship must also discard 1 [crew] Upgrade (of its choice).

ships.name: I.K.S. B'Moth
ships.text: You can perform a Red Maneuver while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Gavroche
ships.text: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [crew] Upgrades and add +1 attack die to each of your attacks this round for each [crew] Upgrade you disabled with this Action.

ships.name: I.R.W. Vorta Vor
ships.text: While you are Cloaked, after you perform a Green Maneuver, you may perform a [sensor-echo] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: 3rd Wing Attack Ship
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable one of your [crew] Upgrades to add +1 attack die to your attack.

ships.name: U.S.S. Yeager
ships.text: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, you do not need to disable the Photon Torpedoes.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your Active Shields. For each Shield you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die for all of your attacks with your Primary Weapon this round.

ships.name: Soong
ships.text: After performing a 5 [forward] Maneuver, if there are no enemy ships in your forward firing arc, you may perform an [evade] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: 2nd Division Cruiser
ships.text: Each time you defend, if you are within Range 1-2 of at least one friendly Jem'Hadar Attack Ship, roll 1 extra defense die.

ships.name: Ti'Mur
ships.text: Whenever you initiate an attack, you may disable one of your non-disabled [tech] Upgrades to add +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Raven
ships.text: Each time you attack or defend, if there is a [scan] token beside your ship, your range combat bonuses are doubled.

ships.name: Enterprise NX-01
ships.text: You may equip the Enhanced Hull Plating [tech] Upgrade to your ship for free even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

ships.name: Ni'Var
ships.text: Whenever you attack an enemy ship at Range 3 with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, you gain +1 attack die for that attack.

ships.name: Scout 608
ships.text: After you move, you may discard one of your Upgrades to perform an additional Green or White Maneuver.  You cannot deploy a [borg] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

ships.name: Borg Starship
ships.text: You cannot deploy a [borg] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Stargazer
ships.text: During the Activation Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: Assimilation Target Prime
ships.text: ACTION: Spend 1 Drone Token to repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

ships.name: Bok's Marauder
ships.text: If you performed a Maneuver of 3 or higher this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add +1 attack die.  If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Prakesh
ships.text: After you move, if you are within Range 1 of a friendly ship, you may immediately perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action.

ships.name: Relora-Sankur
ships.text: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 attack die.

ships.name: Scout 255
ships.text:
If there is a [scan] Token beside your ship during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die. 
You cannot deploy a [borg] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

ships.name: Tal'Kir
ships.text: Each time you defend, during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add 1 [evade] result to your roll.  If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Val Jean
ships.text: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable up to 3 of your Upgrades to add 1 [evade] result to your roll for each Upgrade you disabled with this card.

ships.name: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
ships.text:
When you perform a [cloak] Action, you may immediately perform a [regenerate] Action as a free Action. 
If you do so, you cannot attack that round.

ships.name: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may roll +1 attack die.  If you do so, suffer 1 damage to your Hull.

ships.name: Queen Vessel Prime
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, your ship, or 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship, may spend a Scan Token from beside this ship to gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E
ships.text: You may fire a Torpedo at an enemy ship without needing a Target Lock.  If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Assimilated Vessel 80279
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them (even if they have already been re-rolled).

ships.name: Korok's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text:
When you initiate an attack at Range 1, while Cloaked, your opponent rolls -1 defense die. 

You cannot deploy this card to the same fleet as "Assimilated Vessel 80279."

ships.name: Tactical Cube 001
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard up to 3 of your [borg] Upgrades.  Cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result for each Upgrade you discard with this card.

ships.name: Chang's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text: If you attack with Torpedoes while Cloaked, you do not flip your [cloak] Token over to its red side.

ships.name: I.S.S. Defiant
ships.text: Each time you suffer damage from an attack, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to reduce the amount of damage from that attack by 1.

ships.name: Scimitar
ships.text: After you attack while Cloaked, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to keep your [cloak] Token from flipping to its red side.

ships.name: Cube 112
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire at up to 4 different ships at Range 1-2 with 4 attack dice against each ship. If you do this, spend 1 Drone Token for each of these attacks after the first.

ships.name: Fina Prime
ships.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1 and force that ship to discard 1 of its Active Shield Tokens. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Terok Nor
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-3 with 4 attack dice.

ships.name: Deep Space 9
ships.text: Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may roll up to 2 additional defense dice.  If you do, disable 1 of your Active Shields for each additional die you roll.

ships.name: 1st Wave Attack Fighters
ships.text:
ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5
During the Roll Attack Dice step, you may disable one of your [SQUADRON] Upgrade to gain +1 additional attack die for that attack.

ships.name: Dominion Attack Fighters
ships.text: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 4

ships.name: Trager
ships.text:
During the Compare Results step, you may disable 1 of your Shields to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result. 

You cannot deploy this card to the same fleet as "Assimilated Vessel 64758."

ships.name: Assimilated Vessel 64758
ships.text: When defending, during the Declare Target step, you may spend 1 Drone Token to set 1 of your defense dice on any side that you want.  This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled during that attack.

ships.name: Regent's Flagship
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon,  you may fire in any direction at up to 2 enemy ships at Range 1 with 4 attack dice against each ship.

ships.name: Alpha Hunter
ships.text: After you move, you may perform a [sensor-echo] Action with the 1 [forward] Maneuver as a free Action, even if you are not Cloaked.

ships.name: Fighter Squadron 6
ships.text:
ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5
When attacking a ship at Range 1, if that ship has at least 1 damage to its Hull, during the Modify Attack Dice step, add 1 [hit] result to your roll.

ships.name: Federation Attack Squadron
ships.text: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 4

ships.name: Prototype 01
ships.text: During the End Phase of each round, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields (your choice).  This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
ships.text: This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

ships.name: I.K.S. Pagh
ships.text: When attacking, you may convert 1 of your [crit] results into a [hit] result.  If you do so, you may then convert 1 of your blank results into a [hit] result.

ships.name: Ogla-Razik
ships.text: All friendly Kazon ships with a Hull value of 4 or less within Range 1-2 of this ship gain +1 defense die.

ships.name: I.R.W. Haakona
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon while cloaked, gain +1 attack die for every other Romulan Ship in your fleet (max +4).

ships.name: Gornarus
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict a Critical Damage to an enemy ship's hull, you may search the Damage Deck for a "Structural Damage" or a "Weapons Malfunction" card instead of drawing a random damage card.  Reshuffle the deck when you are done.

ships.name: Reklar
ships.text: ACTION: Place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship. Each time you defend this round, roll +1 defense die.

ships.name: I.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: When attacking a ship that you already have target locked, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: Sakharov
ships.text: At the start of the game, during the Gather Forces Step, you may purchase 1 additional [crew] or [tech] Upgrade for this ship.  This Upgrade may exceed the ship's restrictions and cost -2 SP (min 0).

ships.name: I.S.S. Avenger
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, gain +2 attack dice when attacking with your Primary Weapon.

ships.name: Kyana Prime
ships.text: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For every [evade] result, place 1 [evade] Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Hood
ships.text: When you initiate an attack against a cloaked ship, roll +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Pegasus
ships.text: All of your [tech] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

ships.name: Ratosha
ships.text: After you move, if your ship is within Range 1 of a friendly ship you may perform a [battlestations] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: I.K.S. Korinar
ships.text: While you are cloaked, if you initiate an attack at Range 1 with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die for that attack.

ships.name: I.K.S. Ning'tao
ships.text: After performing a [sensor-echo] Action, you may Come About (reverse direction).  If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Prometheus
ships.text: ACTION: If you performed a [forward] Maneuver this round, immediately perform an additional 1 [forward] or 2 [forward] Maneuver.

ships.name: Aldara
ships.text: When a ship that started the Activation Phase in your forward firing arc moves, if you have not yet moved, you may immediately change your maneuver. You may only use this ability once per round.

ships.name: Azati Prime
ships.text: When defending, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard a Token from beside your ship ( [evade], [scan], or [battlestations] ) to force the attacking ship to roll 1 less attack die.

ships.name: I.R.W. Belak
ships.text: When defending, you may re-roll 1 of your [battlestations] results. If your ship is cloaked, you may re-roll all of your [battlestations] results.

ships.name: U.S.S. Bellerophon
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may disable 2 of your Active Shields to cancel 1 of the attacking ship's [hit] results.

ships.name: Bioship Beta
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may cancel 1 [hit] result. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Bioship Omega
ships.text: During the Deal Damage step, if you inflict 2 critical damage to an enemy ship's hull, you may immediately flip those damage cards face down and rotate the damaged ship's facing by 90 degrees (right or left).

ships.name: I.K.S. Buruk
ships.text: When defending, if your ship is not cloaked and there is a friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship, you may roll +1 defense die. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Dauntless
ships.text: Each time you perform an Action or use an ability on any of your [tech] Upgrades, place 1 Mission Token on this card. During the Roll Attack Dice step, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to gain +1 attack die for that attack for each token spent.

ships.name: Delta Flyer
ships.text:
You may deploy [weapon] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

You may fire your Primary Weapon from your rear firing arc at -1 attack die.

ships.name: Federation Starship
ships.text: You may deploy [weapon] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

ships.name: Diaspora
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is a [battlestations] Token beside your ship, you may discard that Token to re-roll all of your attack dice.

ships.name: Interceptor 8
ships.text: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Intrepid
ships.text: When attacking a ship at Range 3, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, the defending ship rolls -2 defense dice instead of -1.

ships.name: Kreechta
ships.text: When attacking a ship that has damaged Shields, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll a number of your Attack dice up to the number of the defending ship's damaged Shields.

ships.name: U.S.S. Lakota
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may convert 1 of your [hit] results into 1 [crit] result. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Nistrim-Culluh
ships.text: When attacking a ship at Range 3, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die for every friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship (max +2).

ships.name: Nunk's Marauder
ships.text: During the Activation Phase, you may perform a [scan] Action as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Pasteur
ships.text: After you perform a maneuver with a speed of 5 or greater, you may immediately perform an [evade] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: U.S.S. Phoenix
ships.text: Before you move, you may change your maneuver to another maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with the same speed. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Quark's Treasure
ships.text:
You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning any [crew] or [tech] Upgrades to this ship.
You do not place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship when using the Docking or Launching Actions.

ships.name: I.K.S. Rotarran
ships.text: ACTION: Perform a 2nd maneuver on your maneuver dial with a speed of 1 or 2. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot attack this round.

ships.name: Seleya
ships.text: When defending, if you have a [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

ships.name: R.I.S. Talvath
ships.text: ACTION: If you are within Range 1-3 of at least 1 enemy ship, roll 3 defense dice. For every [evade] result, place 1 [evade] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

ships.name: I.R.W. Terix
ships.text: After you perform a Green Maneuver, you may immediately perform a [scan] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: U.S.S. Thunderchild
ships.text: Each time you defend, if you take no damage from an attack, you may immediately roll 1 attack die. A [hit] or [crit] result damages the attacking ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. Toh'Kaht
ships.text: ACTION: Place a [scan] Token and an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. T'Ong
ships.text: When attacking a ship with your Primary Weapon that has a larger Hull value and/or Primary Weapon value than your ship, gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: I.R.W. Vrax
ships.text: If you reveal a 4 [forward] maneuver, immediately before you move, you may change it to a 4 Bank maneuver. Treat this as a Red Maneuver.

captains.name: Ferengi
Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

captains.name: Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

captains.name: Dominion
Gareb
captains.text: At the start of the game, after set up, place a Captain Card under this card so that the Skill Number is visible. This is the Captain Skill of this Card. The cost of this card is the cost of the Captain Card at -3 SP (Min 0). Gareb can field 1 [talent] Upgrade for each [talent] icon on the Captain Card. This card cannot be affected by anything that affects Captain Cards and my only be purchased for a Romulan Drone Ship.

captains.name: Romulan Drone Pilot
captains.text: This card cannot be affected by anything that affects Captain Cards and may only be assigned to a Romulan Drone Ship

captains.name: Romulan
Klingon
Federation
Aquatic Councilor
captains.text: When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may convert 1 of your [battlestations] results into a [evade] result.

captains.name: John Harriman
captains.text: During the Activation Phase, you may perform an [evade] Action as a free Action, if you do so place an Auxiliary  Power token beside your ship.

captains.name: AKOREM LAAN
captains.text: Akorem Laan can field up to 2 Bajoran [talent] Upgrades

captains.name: Bochra
captains.text: If Bochra is assigned as the captain of a Romulan Scout Vessel during the Combat Phase if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 attack and +1 defense die

captains.name: Clark Terell
captains.text: Any friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 defense die.

captains.name: Sar
captains.text: When defending, your ship rolls 1 extra defense die.

captains.name: Maxwell Burke
captains.text: ACTION: Discard this card to gain +2 attack dice this round.

captains.name: Rettik
captains.text: Each time you defend, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results one time.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll 1 attack die. A [hit] or [crit] result damages the attacking ship as normal. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice against this.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text:
At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. 

During the Activation Phase, before you move, you may spend 1 Drone Token to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

captains.name: Hiren
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [crew] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die this round.

captains.name: Tholian Pilot
captains.text: ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, repair 1 Shield Token. You may only use this Action if this card is equipped to a Tholian ship.

captains.name: Centurion
captains.text: When attacking, you may re-roll one of your [battlestations] results.

captains.name: Ronald Moore
captains.text: If your ship has a Hull Value of 3 or less, during the Activation Phase, you may disable this card to place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Jaro Essa
captains.text: ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [crew] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.

captains.name: The Doctor
captains.text: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may attempt to increase your Skill Number. If you do so, roll 1 attack die. If you roll a [hit] or [crit] result, your Captain Skill is a 10 until the End Phase. Otherwise, your Captain Skill is a 0 until the End Phase. Either way, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Bioship Omega Pilot
captains.text: ACTION: Disable this card and 2 of your Active Shields to target a ship at Range 1. Inflict 1 critical damage to the target ship's hull. This card may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

captains.name: Matt Decker
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.

captains.name: Haden
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2 that does not have your ship in its forward firing arc. If you attack that ship this round, gain +1 attack die and roll 1 less defense die.

captains.name: Q
captains.text: ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.

captains.name: Zek
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship. This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.

captains.name: Tal
captains.text: If your ship is not Cloaked, you may perform a [battlestations] Action as your Standard Action, even if the [battlestations] Action is not on your ship's Action Bar. You cannot perform any free Actions during the round in which you use this ability.

captains.name: Kohlar
captains.text:
Your Captain Skill Increases by +2 for each damage card assigned to your ship (max +4). If the damage to your ship is repaired, your Skill Number decreases accordingly.

You may field the â€˜KuvaMaghâ€™ [talent] Upgrade at a cost of -2.

captains.name: Matt Decker
captains.text:
If this card is assigned to a Federation Ship during the Roll Attack Dice step you may disable this card to gain +1 attack die for that attack. 

 If your ship is destroyed you may immediately target a friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship. If you do so discard that captain Card from the target ship. This card becomes the new Captain Card for that ship.

captains.name: Vrax
captains.text: You may deploy the 'Reman Bodyguards' Upgrade to your ship at a cost of -2 SP, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

captains.name: Barak
captains.text: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, you may discard the Photon Torpedoes Upgrade to gain +1 attack die for that attack.

captains.name: TEBOK
captains.text: During the Gather Forces step, if there is at least one other Romulan Ship in your starting fleet, Tebok my field 1 Romulan [talent] at a cost of -1 SP.

captains.name: Tomalak
captains.text: When firing at Range 3, the opposing ship does not roll an extra defense die.

captains.name: Gul Danar
captains.text: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 blank result.

captains.name: Kira Nerys
captains.text: If a [crew] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [evade] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Kira Nerys to a Federation ship.

captains.name: Luaran
captains.text: One of your Dominion Upgrades costs -2 Squadron Points.

captains.name: Kurn
captains.text: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Styles
captains.text: Add 1 additional [tech] icon to your ship's Upgrade bar.

captains.name: Tavek
captains.text: Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar.

captains.name: Lenaris Holem
captains.text: Each time you are attacked, if you have an [evade] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice.

captains.name: Will Decker
captains.text: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may destroy one of your Active Shields to add 1 additional [crit] result to your attack roll.

captains.name: Magnus Hansen
captains.text:
During the Modify Defense Dice step of the combat phase, you may spend 1 [scan] token to add 1 additional [evade] result to your defense roll. 

You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Magnus Hansen to a Federation ship.

captains.name: J. Hayes
captains.text: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die this round. At the end of the Combat Phase, suffer 1 normal damage to your Hull.

captains.name: Third of Five
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 3 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll +1 defense die. You cannot assign this card to the same ship or fleet as Hugh.

captains.name: Elim Garak
captains.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [crew] Upgrades to roll +1 attack die.

captains.name: Haron
captains.text:
Add 1 [weapon] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. 

All of your Kazon [weapon] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

captains.name: Kerla
captains.text: Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice to add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

captains.name: Worf
captains.text: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside the target ship.

captains.name: Slar
captains.text: You may field the "Salvage" [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Gul Ocett
captains.text: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [crit], you may search the Damage Deck for a "Power Disruption" or a "Minor Explosion" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

captains.name: Data
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 1 [evade], 1 [scan], and 1 [battlestations] Token on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may take 1 of these Tokens off this card and place it beside your ship, even if there is already one there.

captains.name: Gardner
captains.text: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.

captains.name: Erik Pressman
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [tech] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR ACTION: Discard 1 of your [tech] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.

captains.name: Lovok
captains.text:
During the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Lovok may field the Tal Shiar [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Arturis
captains.text:
Arturis' Captain Skill is +5 if he is assigned to a Dauntless class ship.

ACTION: Target a ship at Range 2-3. disable either the Captain Card or up to 2 [crew] Upgrades on the target ship (your choice). Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Tarr
captains.text: At the start of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward arc of an enemy ship and you do not have a [battlestations] Token beside your ship, you may place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Quark
captains.text: ACTION: Discard all of your Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-2. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You must discard at least 1 Upgrade to use this Action. You cannot attack or perform any free Actions this round.

captains.name: Telek R'Mor
captains.text:
Each time you defend, if you have at least 1 [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

You may field the Secret Research [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Kaybok
captains.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of [tech] and [weapon] Upgrades deployed to the defending ship.

captains.name: Morag
captains.text: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Degra
captains.text: When attacking with a Secondary [weapon] Upgrade, gain +1 attack die. +2 attack dice if the attack is made with a Xindi [weapon] Upgrade.

captains.name: Kiaphet Amman'Sor
captains.text: ACTION: When defending this round roll +1 defense die. In addition if this card is assigned to a Xindi ship when attacking this round gain +1 attack die.

captains.name: B'Etor
captains.text:
A friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship may use the Action or Ability of your [talent] Upgrade as if it were assigned to that ship.

If Lursa is the Captain of your ship, you may fill one of your [crew] Upgrade slots with this card and gain +4 to your Captain Skill.

captains.name: Lursa
captains.text:
You may preform a [cloak] or a [sensor-echo] Action as a free action, if your ship has the appropriate Action on its Action Bar

If B'Etor is the Captain of your ship, you may fill one of your [crew] Upgrade slots with this card and gain +4 to your Captain Skill.

captains.name: Tal
captains.text: If this card is assigned to a Romulan ship, when attacking at Range 1 with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step gain +1 attack die.

captains.name: Donald Varley
captains.text: Your ship may perform a [scan] Action as a free Action each round.

captains.name: Tactial Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Spend 2 of your Drone Tokens to target a ship at Range 1-2. Discard 1 [evade], 1 [scan], or 1 [battlestations] Token from beside that ship. Place a [scan] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Tim Watters
captains.text: Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Remove all Disabled Upgrade Tokens from all of your [crew] Upgrade.

captains.name: Mirok
captains.text: After you move, if at least one friendly ship is within Range 1 of your ship, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

captains.name: Krell
captains.text: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 of your [battlestations] results.

captains.name: Gul Evek
captains.text: Each time you defend, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

captains.name: Data
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [crew] upgrades and 1 of your [weapon] upgrades to target all Cloaked ship at range 1-3 of your ship. Target ships immediately flip their [cloak] tokens to their red sides.

captains.name: Rudolph Ransom
captains.text: When defending, if there is an [evade] token beside your ship, roll +2 defense dice.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text:
At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. 

When attacking, you may spend 1 Drone Token to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

captains.name: Culluh
captains.text: After you move, you may discard 1 of your [crew] Upgrades to perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action this round.

captains.name: Loskene
captains.text: ACTION: Target 1 friendly ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship and whose Captain has a lower Skill than Loskene's. Target ship may immediately perform an additional 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn). The additional Maneuver must be on the target ship's Maneuver Dial.

captains.name: Gorn Commander
captains.text: When attacking, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [hit] result.

captains.name: Hugh
captains.text:
All of your [crew] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any Borg Upgrades to your ship.

captains.name: Keevan
captains.text: ACTION: Target 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2 in your forward firing arc. Your ship cannot attack any other ship this round and must attack that ship, if possible. During the Combat Phase, if your ship attacks with its Primary Weapon, it resolves its attack immediately before the target ship, as if it had a higher Captain Skill than that ship. If the target ship attacks your ship this round, it gains +4 attack dice.

captains.name: Maxwell Forrest
captains.text: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

captains.name: Kuvak
captains.text: After you move, if you perform an [evade] Action, you may place 2 [evade] Tokens beside your ship instead of 1 if your ship is not in the forward firing arc of any enemy ships.

captains.name: Matthew Dougherty
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.

captains.name: Benjamin Sisko
captains.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades ([crew], [tech] or [weapon]). If you do so, gain +1 attack die to that attack for each Upgrade you discarded with this card.

captains.name: Gorkon
captains.text: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [evade] result, place 1 [evade] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [evade] Action as a free Action this round.

captains.name: Kira Nerys
captains.text: When a [crew] Upgrade on an enemy ship within Range 1-2 of your ship performs an Action that would affect your ship, you may disable this card to prevent that Action from taking effect. If you do this, the enemy ship cannot take another Action that round. If the enemy [crew] Upgrade was disabled to perform the Action, it remains disabled. If the enemy [crew] Upgrade was discarded to perform the Action, disable it instead.
